agents.name: Agent1
agents.note: Completed US-014: Refactor calibration modules. Created calibration/types.py (CalibrationState enum, 8 dataclasses, 4 constants), calibration/exceptions.py (4 exceptions), calibration/session.py (6 session lifecycle functions), calibration/collector.py (5 reading collection functions), calibration/export.py (exportSession and helpers), calibration/manager.py (CalibrationManager), calibration/comparator.py (CalibrationComparator), calibration/helpers.py (9 factory/config functions). Updated calibration/__init__.py with 41 exports. 69 calibration_manager tests pass, 33 calibration_comparator tests pass, 324 total tests pass.

Created drive/types.py (DriveState, DetectorState enums, DriveSession, DetectorConfig, DetectorStats dataclasses, constants), drive/exceptions.py (3 exceptions), drive/detector.py (DriveDetector), drive/helpers.py (6 functions). Updated original drive_detector.py to re-export. 57 drive_detector tests pass, 324 total tests pass.

agents.name: Agent3
agents.note: Completed US-043: Create simulator CLI commands. Implemented SimulatorCli class with keyboard commands (p=pause/resume, f=inject failure, c=clear failures, s=status, h=help, q=quit). Non-blocking input via background thread. 44 tests passing.
